Do you guys know about HInduism or Sanatana dharma? The faith of a billion of people across the World and the worlds third largest religion. There are multiple aspects of this faith which is appealing like it respects other faiths and says that all paths lead to god, the concept of goddesses or the faminine gods, lack of a rigid must do or rules etc.
 
 If you like to know more, I rge you to visit this site which explains everything in details. Please see < http://dharma.indviews.com. It is worth a click!
I am somewhat familiar. Ultimately it is all unprovable romanticism.

I am delighted to see this thread. I am a proud Hindu outside the subcontinent, and a person who tries to be a good Sanatanist. Sanatan Dharma, literally translates into " eternal dharma," and while I know that practices of the past has not been all good in the religion, and are very much known, since the west loves to dwell on it while tey do not see their own faults, I am yet to find a doctrine that can compare for my life. It might be different for other people, but I am prod to say I am a proud Hindu.

I am somewhat familiar. Ultimately it is all unprovable romanticism.

 
 It will be appreciated if you can clear up what you mean by this.
 
 As far as i know, hinduism is still a living religion, which i aspire to practise, like many others thoughout the world. We may not all be perfect to it, but we tried. Some may have succeeded, but we are not a judges of who is a better hindu, or a follower of any other religion for that matter.
 
 Perhaps, its time to change that "somewhat familiar", into "much more familiar".
 
 PS. as Hindus, we are encouraged to appreciate someone else's beliefs, as it all leads to the one common goal that is salvation. No one person is more right than the other. Is this not interesting?

What's the mantra?

 
 The mantra for what?
 
 A "mantra" when translated literally means a prayer that is recited. It may be a prayer to god or it may be a composition of personal upliftment.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Sanatana dharma or eternal religion
